p: The evaluation of the antimicrobial activity of essential oil obtained from the leaves of A. suaveolens was tested against two gram-negative bacteria (Escherichia coli ATCC25922, Salmonella sp. ATCC14028) and two gram-positive bacteria (Staphylococcus aureus ATCC6538). Microorganisms were provided by the Oswaldo Cruz Foundation (FIOCRUZ). The bacteria were initially reactivated from stock cultures, maintained on Mueller-Hinton broth (MHC) for 18 h at 37°C.
